definition: room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: Can we ask for leave to see our roommate in the hospital?
sentences.chinese: 我們能請假去醫院看望我們同寢室的同學嗎？

sentences.english: Miss Jin and I returned to our bedroom to take some sleeping necessities.
sentences.chinese: 於是我和靳兄一起回寢室拿一些露宿必需品。

sentences.english: Naomi Rockler-GladenLiving in a small college dorm room with a roommate is not easy!
sentences.chinese: 在大學裏，與室友生活在一個小寢室裏真不容易。

sentences.english: I finally picked out three books which were written in a style easy enough for me to understand, and I took these back to my room.
sentences.chinese: 臨走時，我還選了三本簡單易懂的帶回寢室。

sentences.english: In the bedroom there is a memorial tablet of him.
sentences.chinese: 寢室內供有李鴻章靈位。

sentences.english: The picture gallery, and two or three of the principal bedrooms, were all that remained to be shewn.
sentences.chinese: 剩下來只有畫室和兩三間主要的寢室要指給他們看了。

sentences.english: The priest gave Wang a duster and asked him to hang it on the outsidedoorframe of his bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 道士就將一把蠅甩子交給王生，叫他掛在寢室的門上。

sentences.english: He chummed with my little brother in Beijing University.
sentences.chinese: 他與我的弟弟在北京大學住在一間寢室裏。

sentences.english: Do you know the name of that girl whose brother is your roommate ?
sentences.chinese: 你知道她的哥哥與你同寢室的那位女孩的名字嗎？

sentences.english: This is a dormitory in Thailand that my mom and dad underwrote. And every year about 30 students.
sentences.chinese: 這是在泰國的一個由我的媽媽和爸爸出資的學生寢室。

sentences.english: How do you think about the relationship between your room-mates now?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得你們寢室室友之間現在的關係好嗎？

sentences.english: I roomed with Jack in college for two years.
sentences.chinese: 在大學裏我和傑克同寢室兩年只久。

sentences.english: "Thank you for a wonderful evening, "she said softly. Before I comprehended what had happened, she disappeared into the dormitory.
sentences.chinese: 當我意識到所發生的一切時，她已消失在寢室裏。

sentences.english: All the other roomies were told a history of plane development by a roomie .
sentences.chinese: 整個寢室的同學聽一個同學講了飛機的發展史。

sentences.english: The moving of cooking appliances to use in bedrooms in strictly forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 禁止將炊煮電器移動或搬移至寢室使用。

sentences.english: Was a bedroom student's mother who gave him lined clothes.
sentences.chinese: 是同寢室一個學生的母親給了他一件夾衣。

definition: quilt wrapped around the body as a tube (traditional bedding)/(contemporary) bedding/quilt/blankets/cover/bed
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
air conditioning/air conditioner (including units that have a heating mode)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
variant of 陽臺|阳台[yang2 tai2]
to close a door/to lock a door/(of a shop etc) to close (for the night, or permanently)
